pullRequest.title: add summary to main settings/preferences screen
pullRequest.bodyText: fix #3744 by adding summary to main preference screen.  This will let users find the preferences easier.

nodes.bodyText: I have not seen an app that uses ellipses in the end of settings descriptions. The main Android settings app does not use them, too. I would prefer to not add them.
